author: Connor Sottosanti
comment: Great app, very useful at times. That said, there are some quite annoying bugs that could use fixing. Many times when I sync an album to the watch it will load and say "sync successful" and the album will show up on the watch with no photos in it. I try deleting and syncing again -- doesn't work. I have to delete the app on my phone and watch and reinstall to fix, doing this every time makes the app finicky but still very useful in class :)

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi Connor, if some of the photos are not being transferred to the watch, you can simply delete the album on the phone app, then sync, then re-add the album and sync again. You can do this trick for a fresh sync on the watch. Also, make sure that you are using the latest Google Play Services version. In case you need any help, just send us an email.

author: Tom Cassel
comment: This person should have all their apps free but this one. By far still the best after two years using it on wear 1.5 and 2.0. The person would have a mint. So many other similar apps I paid for and this is free and by far the best period. BTW I do not work for these people and rarely if ever write a review unless they're in the gutter or they're very best.

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Wow, thank you so much for your review, Tom! We are so glad to hear that you're happy with the app! The app is free so that people can download it and test it before getting the premium version. If you ever need anything please feel free to send us an email. Thanks again for your very kind words! Best Wishes!

author: Subhadip Dey
comment: To the developers i need to say something.  It used to work great with my zenwatch 3 buy recently i updated the watch to wear 2.0 and suddenly i ended up getting pixilated images on my watch after sync. This is really a big deal for me because I use this app for many important purpose and a clear photo in the watch is highly required.  If u guys are listening plz do something.

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi Subhadip, you can change the image quality in the app settings. Once you launch the app on your phone, go to 'Settings' and tap on the 'Image quality' option. After that, you will need to remove the previous albums and re-sync them so that the new image quality will take effect. If you need any help, you can contact us at support@moletag.com.

author: Perla Bencosme
comment: Till now this app is very useful, you can see through ur watch up to 20 photos and i think its enough... usually we dont use our gallery so much.

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi Perla, thank you very much for your review! If you ever need to transfer and sync a larger number of photos, feel free to upgrade to the premium version. If you change your mind later, you can simply send us an email and we will refund you. Enjoy the app!

author: Yaswanth Chowdary
comment: Very annoying app some times the photos are not being transferred from phone to watch.

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi Yaswanth, could you send us an email at support@moletag.com so that we help you out? Best Regards

author: Max Pilotto
comment: There are some sync issues and every time the display goes off the app closes

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi Max, if you are facing any issue with the sync, please send us an email so that we assist you. There's an option to keep the screen on in the watch app settings. That way the display won't be turning off while the app is running. Let us know if you need any help. Best Regards

author: anis jahshan
comment: Great app. I use it to cheat in school and it works great I get straight a'S . All I do is that I take pictures of the book pages and I sync them. I recommend this app for everyone.

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi Anis, thank you for your review! Our intention is for people to be able to enjoy their favorite moments on their wrists, however, we guess that users will always find more creative things to do with an app :) Best Regards

author: FiggerNaggot
comment: Sync is so random. A sorting option would be nice.

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi FiggerNaggot, the images are automatically sorted on the watch by the date that they were taken. However, we will add more sorting options as well. In case you need any help, please feel free to send us an email. Best Regards

author: hriday soin
comment: App not getting installed in my watch

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Dear Hriday, if you are running Android Wear 2.x, you will have to manually install the app on your watch using the Play Store app of the watch. Apps on your phone will no longer get installed automatically on your watch. You will need to install them separately. If you need any help, please contact us at support@moletag.com. Best Regards

author: Kukil Sarma
comment: All photos are not sync

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Dear Kukil, are you running the latest app version? Could you send us an email at support@moletag.com so that we assist you? Best Regards

author: Venessa Franco
comment: I want a screen saver

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi Venessa, you can select the "Keep screen on" option so that the photo will be always visible. Could you send us an email at support@moletag.com so that we assist you? Best Regards

author: Marco Galai
comment: Very buggy

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Dear Marco, do you have the latest app version? Could you send us an email at support@moletag.com so that we assist you? Best Regards

author: // TveXx \\
comment: Great for my smart watch *;*

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Thanks so much for your review, TveXx! Happy New Year!

comment: Nice

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Thank you for your review! We hope you enjoy the app :)

author: Hardik Pakhale
comment: Awesome app, been using this for years now. Just one thing, even when i delete a folder from my phone in the app, the folder and images still remain on the app in my watch. Just check this issue out. Other than that, awesome app 😁

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi Hardik, thank you for the review! Once you delete the album on the phone app, then you simply have to press the Sync button and the album will be deleted from the watch as well. You can also delete an album directly on the watch by long tapping on the album's name and selecting the delete option. Let us know if you need any help. Best Regards

author: Harsh Shrivastav
comment: I am using anytime gallery application witch is best app but lot's of people including me facing a problem  while using this application witch is when i zoom picture then i am not able to view the edges of image please improve this sir please it's a request and provide 2 method of zoom image 1st double tap which is already in app and 2nd method is zoom image using 2 fingers please sir help us as much as possible it's a humble request .  My device is moto 360.

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Dear Harsh, if you disable the full screen option, then you will be able to view the edges of the image. Two-fingers zoom is already supported, isn't that working for you? Could you send us an email at support@moletag.com so that we assist you? Best Regards

author: Manmeet Bhambra
comment: Please add the option to add images manually selecting as well. I don't want to add all the whole folders.  What will i do if i have 14k files in a folder. For that i have to manually  create another folder of selective images. Give that option in the next update or even  u can give in full version and ill purchase it.  thanks in advance :)

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi Manmeet, thank you very much for the review! We plan to add this option very soon. If you'd like us to keep you updated, please send us an email at support@moletag.com and we'll let you know once this feature is released. Best Regards

author: A K
comment: I it a good app, too bad it ain't free. Has some bugs here and there, but nothing critical.

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Dear A K, thank you for the review! Feel free to get the premium version and if you change your mind just send us an email so that we refund you. Also, if you notice any issue just let us know so that we fix it. Thank you! Best Regards

comment: Need work . Need the ability to add single photos . Will only allow you add albums

However, we will add that option as well in a future update. If you need any help, please feel free to send us an email. Best Regards

reply.content: Thank you so much for your review, Daniel! We're glad to hear that you are happy with the app :) Best Regards

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi Hesham, we plan to add support for video files in a future update. If you would like to know more about that, simply send us an email at support@moletag.com. Best Regards

reply.content: Hi Keshav, do you mean for example an option to ask for fingerprint once you launch the app? We can add that in a future update. Let us know your suggestions. Best Regards

comment: I like what you made moletag,best App For Wear...With best customer Support ..Thanku for Helping me Great APP 😀Great Feedback

reply.content: Hi Jacky, thank you so much for your kind words! Enjoy the app :) Best Regards

reply.content: Dear Sir/Madam, we have already added support for Android Wear 2.0 watches. Could you please send us an email at support@moletag.com so that we check the issue that you mention? Best Regards

comment: Says that photos are synced but its not actually on my watch.

reply.content: Dear Rain, in the latest app update we had fixed that issue. Do you have the latest app version? Could you send us an email at support@moletag.com so that we help you out with the issue? Thank you! Best Regards

author: Rakib Rownaq
comment: Free version should have more ability

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Dear Rakib, there is a 20 images limit for users to test the app and decide whether they want to upgrade to the full version or not. Feel free to upgrade anytime you want, we offer a lifetime return policy. Let us know if you need any help. Best Regards

author: Peter Przybyla
comment: I can transfer and view photos with no issue to my Huawei smartwatch. However, I can only transfer whole albums. I don't want 726 photos transferred from my main album. So my options are to transfer everything and delete from the watch one by one or create a new album on my phone. Not very convenient.  Please add a photo selection option to individually pick photos.

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi Peter, thanks for the review. We designed the app to transfer whole albums instead of manually picking the images one by one, in order to make the app simpler and more user friendly. However, we will add the option to transfer individual images from each album in a future update. If you need any help, please feel free to contact us. Best Wishes

title: Works but is not convenient for android wear.

author: Passawit Kaovilai
comment: The only reason I got this app is to view periodic Table in full from the watch. When zoomed in, things are blurry compared to original file on the phone. I only wanted one photo, so maybe add optional high resolution for some specific photos? Or a new app for high-res only.

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Dear Passawit, the images are first being compressed and optimized for watch use, however we will add the option for users to choose the image quality they prefer very soon in a future update. In case you have any other suggestions, please feel free to send us an email. Best Regards

title: Not high res

author: Derek Hollier-Day
comment: Would like to see a streaming option, loaded direct from the gallery and a sync button for those viewed on the watch, instead of just preloading each time, but until then,  I can use myroll for that

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Hi Derek, thank you very much for your review! The main reason we pre-load the images is because we want the app to work offline, even when you don't have your phone connected to your watch. However, we might add your suggestion as an optional option in a future update. In case you ever need any help, feel free to send us an email. Best Regards

title: Awesome

author: Bhargav Dangat
comment: I want to upgrade my app but when i went to upgrade it....... it deducted my 50 Rs but still  the app was not upgraded......i lost my 100 rs cauz i tried it twice..... please solve my problem!

reply.author: Moletag
reply.content: Dear Bhargav, you cancelled both orders you made, that's why the app wasn't upgraded. Since you cancelled the orders, you won't be charged at all. If you need any help, let us know. We have also sent you an email but we haven't received any response yet. Best Regards

reply.content: Dear Softech, the photos on the watch are automatically sorted by the date that they were taken, however we will add more sorting options very soon. In case you need any help, please feel free to send us an email at support@moletag.com. Best Regards

comment: It does not work properly. It does not transef all the images from an album.
